item.title: Getting a Category Feed Up and Running with Jekyll on Github
item.author: jeff.w.hollister@gmail.com (Jeffrey W. Hollister)
item.description: Now that I have the site up and running, I am now trying to add a few category specific RSS feeds. I will say that for someone who is new to RSS (i.e. me) the feeds on Wordpress are really easy. But, since I now fancy myself somewhat of hacker, I suppose figuring out how to get a Jekyll site hosted on Github to spit these out is something I should do.
